location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government, dated 17 January 1811. In response, it states that the Bushire stores do not have suitable woollens to meet the request of Sir Harford Jones [Brydges].
